name: Starhaze: Gravity Quest
description: Starhaze: Gravity Quest is a meditative space arcade game based on gravitational mechanics. At the moment, the game contains 8 missions. The goal of each mission is to collect the plasma orbiting the planets and get to the exit. To move a ship, it is necessary to use its engines and take into account the effect of gravity from the planets. The game has a global and local player rating, as well as leaderboards within each mission.
